      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ion solvation in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionensolvatisierung im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solvatisation d'ion dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solvation do íon na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solvatazione dello ione in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιονικό solvation στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Solvation del ion en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how water dissolves ionic compounds. During solvation, water molecules attract and hold ions from the surfaces of solids.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solvation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Wasser Ionenmittel 
auflöst. Während der Solvatisierung ziehen Wassermoleküle an 
und halten Ionen von den Oberflächen der Körper an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment l'eau 
dissout les composés ioniques. Pendant la solvatisation, les 
molécules d'eau attirent et tiennent des ions des surfaces des 
solides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como a água dissolve 
compostos ionic. Durante o solvation, as moléculas de água 
atraem e prendem íons das superfícies dos sólidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come l'acqua 
dissolve i residui ionici. Durante la solvatazione, le molecole 
di acqua attraggono e tengono gli ioni dalle superfici dei solidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς το ύδωρ διαλύει 
τις ιοντικές ενώσεις. Κατά τη διάρκεια solvation, τα 
μόρια ύδατος προσελκύουν και κρατούν τα ιόντα από τις 
επιφάνειες των στερεών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo el agua 
disuelve compuestos iónicos. Durante el solvation, las 
moléculas de agua atraen y sostienen los iones de las superficies de 
sólidos.</string>
          </description>
